name: CSS-Stylish-Popup (toolbar icon)
description:
Only for Stylish-Popup (toolbar icon) 
Only for old Stylish.crx (V1.5.2), not for New version V6.
Only for Google Chrome Browser

This is the effect with the Tampermonkey popup is about the same!
The entire width of the menu to be the click target and not just the style's name.

Like it?

Can not be installed directly, you can click Show CSS, and then copy the CSS code.
